permissions.NSCameraUsageDescription: CRYB needs access to your camera to take photos and videos for sharing in chats and voice calls.
permissions.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: CRYB needs access to your microphone for voice messages and voice/video calls.
permissions.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: CRYB needs access to your photo library to share images and videos in chats.
permissions.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: CRYB can optionally use your location to find nearby friends and servers.
permissions.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: CRYB uses Face ID and Touch ID for secure authentication and to protect your account.
permissions.NSContactsUsageDescription: CRYB can optionally access your contacts to help you find friends who are already using the app.
